info.name: Fx 31+ about:newtab hide the Search Bar
info.description: Firefox 31 and later versions - hide the search-container and the margin-top
info.additionalInfo:
about:newtab Search Bar is a new feature in Firefox 31

As far as the image with 5 wide tiles - in about:config you can edit the Value of these two preferences.

browser.newtabpage.columns
browser.newtabpage.rows
